metadata.Title: CVE-2019-6502 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
sc_context_create in ctx.c in libopensc in OpenSC 0.19.0 has a memory leak, as demonstrated by a call from eidenv.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-6502` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

opensc - 0.20.0-1
opensc-pkcs11 - 0.20.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: opensc package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.20.0-1').
